content: sleeve sts until 1 st before purl bump together with 1st from left hand needle k2tog next raglan marker m1rp p1 sm p1 m1lp p2 turn repeat this process for the entire round work 4 sts increase d at this point you may unravel your waste yarn from the gsr 3 gsr knit to bor m slipping raglan markers as provisional co and discard you come to them knit to 1 st before first raglan marker m1r k1 sm k1 m1l knit across sleeve sts until 1 st be- fore next marker m1r k1 sm k1 m1l knit to previous gsr knitting the double st k2 turn work 4 sts increase d gsr 4 gsr purl to bor m slipping the raglan markers as you come to them purl to 1 st before raglan marker m1rp p1 sm p1 m1lp purl across sleeve sts until 1 st before next raglan marker m1rp p1 sm p1 m1lp purl to previ- ous gsr purling the double st p2 turn work 4 sts increase d repeat gsr 3 & 4 2 more times gsr 9 gsr knit to bor m slipping raglan markers as you come to them next round knit resolving any double sts as you come to them 32 sts increase d 112 116 116 120 120 124 124 124 sts 38 40 40 44 46 48 48 48 sts each front/back 18 18 18 16 14 14 14 14 sts each sleeve 2 work raglan shaping join to work in the round and knit 2 rnds round 1 *knit until 1 st before marker m1r k1 sm k1 shape sleeve as follows changing to dpn or 9 / 22 5cm m1l repeat from * 3 more times then knit to bor m 8 sts circulars when necessary increase d 120 124 124 128 128 132 132 132 sts decrease round k1 k2tog knit to last 3 sts ssk k1 2 sts decrease d repeat decrease round every 8 6 4 4 4 3 3 3 rnds 7 9 12 round 2 knit 13 13 16 20 22 more times 36 36 36 36 40 40 40 44 sts rem repeat last 2 rnds 14 15 16 17 18 19 21 23 more times ending with round 2 work even until sleeve measures 14 14 5 14 5 15 15 15 5 16 16 5 /35 36 36 37 5 37 5 39 40 41 cm 112 120 128 136 144 152 168 184 sts increase d 232 from underarm or desired sleeve length less 3 5 / 9cm for 244 252 264 272 284 300 316 sts the cuff 68 72 74 80 84 88 92 96 sts each back and front 48 50 52 52 52 54 58 62 sts each sleeve change to ribbing needle and k 1 round divide for body and sleeves begin ribbing pattern as follows *k3 p1 repeat from * to bor m note with the exception of the bor m remove all other
